sections.heading: Compensation of alderman or councilman; failure to comply; classification9-304
sections.text: Compensation of alderman or councilman; failure to comply; classificationA. No mayor, alderman or councilman of any city or town shall, during the term for which he has been elected, knowingly accept, take or receive for
